availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew Jackson Price (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Jemima Price. Father of Julia A. Price, Kingston Price, Mahulda J. Price, Winfield J. Price, Fairway Price, North J. Price, Therressa Price, Crossford Price, and Martin L. Price. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 102A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, Paintsville, p. 196.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, Paintsville, p. 182A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 9th Congressional District, Johnson County, Vol. 3 of 3, October 1863, p. 125, (Accessed via ancestry.com on August 20, 2020).
